tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.content:
1. Terms



By accessing this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms

of Service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that

you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws.

If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited

from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in

this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark

law.

2. Use License



Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the

materials on Teacher Digital Agency's website for personal,

non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of

a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you

may not: modify or copy the materials; use the materials for

any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial

or non-commercial); attempt to decompile or reverse engineer

any software contained on Teacher Digital Agency's website;

remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the

materials; or transfer the materials to another person or

mirror the materials on any other server. This license shall

automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions

and may be terminated by Teacher Digital Agency at any time.

Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the

termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded

materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed

format. These Terms of Service have been created with the help

of the Terms of Service Generator.

3. Disclaimer



The materials on Teacher Digital Agency's website are provided

on an 'as is' basis. Teacher Digital Agency makes no warranties,

expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all

other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties

or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose,

or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation

of rights. Further, Teacher Digital Agency does not warrant or

make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results,

or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or

otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to

this site.

4. Limitations



In no event shall Teacher Digital Agency or its suppliers be

liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages

for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption)

arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on

Teacher Digital Agency's website, even if Teacher Digital Agency

or a Teacher Digital Agency authorized representative has been

notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied

warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or

incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

5. Revisions and Errata



The materials appearing on Teacher Digital Agency's website

could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors.

Teacher Digital Agency does not warrant that any of the materials

on its website are accurate, complete or current. Teacher Digital

Agency may make changes to the materials contained on its website

at any time without notice. Teacher Digital Agency does not,

however, make any commitment to update the materials.

6. Links



Teacher Digital Agency has not reviewed all of the sites linked

to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any

such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply

endorsement by Teacher Digital Agency of the site. Use of any

such linked website is at the user's own risk.

7. Modifications of Terms of Service



Teacher Digital Agency may revise these terms of service for

its website at any time without notice. By using this website

you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of

these Terms of Service.

8. Your Privacy



Please read our Privacy Policy.

9. Governing Law



Any claim relating to Teacher Digital Agency's website shall

be governed by the laws of the Czech Republic without regard

to its conflict of law provisions.

gdpr.title: Privacy Policy
gdpr.content:
The website management is committed to respecting the principles of protecting your personal data on the Internet. We place great emphasis on protecting the data provided. Our privacy policy is based on the provisions of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union. The purposes for which we collect personal data are as follows: improving our services, communicating with visitors to this website, providing user-requested information, providing services related to the focus of the respective website, and also for the following purposes.

Collection and use of personal data

We collect and use personal data only with your voluntary consent. If you agree, you allow us to collect and use the following data: name, email, phone number, personal photo. The collection and processing of your data is carried out in accordance with the laws applicable in the European Union and the Czech Republic.

Storage, modification, and deletion of data

The user who has provided their personal data to the website has the right to modify and delete them, as well as to revoke their consent to their use. The period for which your personal data will be stored is the time required to use the data for the main activity of the website. In case of termination of the use of your data, the website management will delete them. To access your personal data, you can contact the website management at the email address support@teacherdigitalagency.cz or the phone number +420 987 654 321. We may provide your personal data to third parties only with your voluntary consent. However, if they have already been transferred, we cannot modify them if they are already listed with other organizations not related to us.

Use of data when visiting the website

When you visit the website, settings for the browser, operating system, and other technical information necessary for the correct display of the website content will be stored in the database. However, based on this data, we cannot identify the visitor's identity.

Provision of information by children

If you are a parent or guardian and have found that your children have provided their personal data to us without your consent, please contact us either by email at @teacherdigitalagency or by phone at +420 987 654 321. Our service prohibits the storage of personal data of minors without the consent or guardianship.

Use of cookies

We use cookies to display content correctly and facilitate the use of the website. These are small files stored on your device. These files help the website remember information about you, such as the language in which you browse the pages and which pages you have already visited, which will be useful for your next visit. Thanks to cookies, browsing the website will be much more convenient for you. You can set your browser to accept or block cookies separately. However, the inability to accept cookies may limit the performance of the website.

Use of personal data by other services

This website uses third-party internet services that collect information independently of us. The collected data may be shared with other services within these organizations and may be used to personalize ads in their own advertising network. You can read the terms of use of these organizations on their websites. You can also refuse the collection of your personal data, for example, by using a Google Analytics service blocker. We do not provide personal data to other organizations and services not mentioned in these privacy policies, except for the transfer of information according to legal requirements of state authorities authorized to perform such actions.

Links to other websites

Our website may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for their content. We recommend that you read the privacy policies on those websites if they are provided.

Changes to the privacy policies

Our website may occasionally update its privacy policies. All changes are announced by publishing new privacy policies on this page. We monitor changes in legislation regarding the protection of personal data in the European Union and the Czech Republic. If you have entrusted us with your personal data, we will notify you of any changes to the privacy policies. If your contact details were entered incorrectly, we cannot contact you.

Feedback, final provisions

If you have any questions regarding the privacy policies, please contact the website administrator at support@teacherdigitalagency.cz or +420 987 654 321. In such a case, you must give up the possibility of visiting our website.
